Uses of Class
nachos.threads.KThread

  • Packages that use KThread 
    Package Description
    nachos.ag
    Provides classes that can be used to automatically grade Nachos projects.
    nachos.security
    Provides classes that can be used to protect the host system from malicious Nachos kernels.
    nachos.threads
    Provides classes that support a multithreaded kernel.
    nachos.userprog
    Provides classes that allow Nachos to load and execute single-threaded user programs in separate address spaces.

    • Uses of KThread in nachos.ag

      Methods in nachos.ag with parameters of type KThread 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void AutoGrader.readyThread(KThread thread)
      Notify the autograder that the specified thread has moved to the ready state.
      void BasicTestGrader.runningThread(KThread thread) 
      void AutoGrader.runningThread(KThread thread)
      Notify the autograder that the specified thread is now running.
      void AutoGrader.setIdleThread(KThread idleThread)
      Notify the autograder that the specified thread is the idle thread.

    • Uses of KThread in nachos.security

      Methods in nachos.security with parameters of type KThread 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Privilege.TCBPrivilege.associateThread(KThread thread)
      Associate the current TCB with the specified KThread.
      void Privilege.TCBPrivilege.authorizeDestroy(KThread thread)
      Authorize the TCB associated with the specified thread to be destroyed.

    • Uses of KThread in nachos.threads

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static KThread KThread.currentThread()
      Get the current thread.
      abstract KThread ThreadQueue.nextThread()
      Notify this thread queue that another thread can receive access.

      Set the name of this thread.
      KThread KThread.setTarget(java.lang.Runnable target)
      Set the target of this thread.
      Methods in nachos.threads with parameters of type KThread 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract void ThreadQueue.acquire(KThread thread)
      Notify this thread queue that a thread has received access, without going through request() and nextThread().
      int Scheduler.getEffectivePriority(KThread thread)
      Get the effective priority of the specified thread.
      int PriorityScheduler.getEffectivePriority(KThread thread) 
      int Scheduler.getPriority(KThread thread)
      Get the priority of the specified thread.
      int PriorityScheduler.getPriority(KThread thread) 
      void Scheduler.setPriority(KThread thread, int priority)
      Set the priority of the specified thread.
      void PriorityScheduler.setPriority(KThread thread, int priority) 
      abstract void ThreadQueue.waitForAccess(KThread thread)
      Notify this thread queue that the specified thread is waiting for access.

    • Uses of KThread in nachos.userprog

      Subclasses of KThread in nachos.userprog 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  UThread
      A UThread is KThread that can execute user program code inside a user process, in addition to Nachos kernel code.
